subject: Science
goals: Understand the basics of atomic structure, including protons, neutrons, and electrons, and learn how to read and interpret the periodic table.
milestones: Successfully identify the basic components of an atom and locate elements on the periodic table by the end of the week.

learning_tasks.task: Read about atomic structure in the textbook
Watch an introductory video on atomic structure and the periodic table

practice_tasks.task: Complete a worksheet on identifying parts of an atom
Use an online periodic table tool to locate and note key information about 5 different elements

resources: Textbook chapter on atomic structure, Khan Academy video on atomic structure and the periodic table, online periodic table tool (e.g., ptable.com)
